web-dev.title: Web Development Course by Scaler
web-dev.description: This comprehensive course by Scaler covers essential web development skills, including front-end development, HTML, CSS, and Javascript. It’s designed to equip learners with the knowledge needed to build and maintain websites.

web-dev.title: The Complete 2022 Web Development Course on Udemy
web-dev.description: Udemy’s complete web development course covers both front-end and back-end development. Learn HTML, CSS, Javascript, and React, and gain practical skills in building web applications.

web-dev.title: Web Design for Everybody on Coursera
web-dev.description: This Coursera specialization teaches the basics of web design and development. Learn how to create user-friendly websites using HTML, CSS, and design principles.

web-dev.title: Web Development with JavaScript by MIT xPRO
web-dev.description: MIT xPRO’s course focuses on web development using Javascript. Explore cloud applications and gain practical experience in building dynamic web content.

python.title: Python for Data Science, AI & Development by IBM on Coursera
python.description: This course covers essential Python skills for data science, AI, and development. Learn Python programming and gain insights into data analysis.

python.title: Crash Course on Python by Google on Coursera
python.description: Google’s crash course provides a quick introduction to Python. Explore data structures, problem-solving, and Python programming.

python.title: Python for Everybody by University of Michigan on Coursera
python.description: This specialization covers Python basics, data structures, and web development tools. Gain practical skills in Python programming.

python.title: Google IT Automation with Python Professional Certificate
python.description: Learn Python for IT automation, cloud computing, and Google Cloud Platform. This professional certificate program equips you with essential skills.

java.title: Java for Beginners by Programming with Mosh
java.description: This beginner-friendly course by Programming with Mosh covers the fundamentals of Java programming. Learn about Java syntax, object-oriented concepts, and problem-solving techniques.

java.title: Java Programming: Solving Problems with Software on Coursera
java.description: In this Coursera course, you’ll dive deeper into Java programming. Explore arrays, lists, and structured data while solving real-world problems.

java.title: Java FullStack Developer by Board Infinity
java.description: Board Infinity’s specialization covers full-stack development using Java. Gain practical skills in front-end design, Angular, and Spring Boot.

java.title: Java Programming and Software Engineering Fundamentals by Duke University on Coursera
java.description: Duke University’s specialization introduces you to Java programming and software engineering. Learn about web design, CSS, and building robust applications.

android.title: Android Basics in Kotlin | Training Courses | Android Developers
android.description: This course is the recommended starting point for learning Android. Using Jetpack Compose, you’ll build a series of apps in Kotlin, covering Material Design, app architecture, data storage, network fetching, and more. No prior programming experience required.

android.title: Jetpack Compose for Android developers
android.description: Dive deeper into Jetpack Compose, the modern toolkit for building Android UIs. Enhance your skills in creating beautiful user interfaces using Kotlin.

android.title: Modern Android app architecture
android.description: Learn recommended architecture and best practices for building robust Android apps suitable for production environments.

android.title: Kotlin for Java developers
android.description: Convert Java code to Kotlin using Android Studio and learn Kotlin conventions. Write Kotlin code that can be called from Java.

ml.title: Machine Learning with Python Course by IBM on Coursera
ml.description: This course provides a foundational understanding of machine learning using Python. Topics include supervised vs. unsupervised learning, linear & non-linear regression, and classification techniques (K-Nearest Neighbors, decision trees, and Logistic Regression). You’ll also explore clustering methods like k-means, hierarchical clustering, and DBSCAN. Hands-on labs using Python libraries like SciPy and scikit-learn enhance your practical skills. By the end, you’ll have job-ready competencies and a certificate in machine learning from IBM.

ml.title: Python for Data Science, AI & Development by IBM on Coursera
ml.description: This course covers essential Python skills for data science, AI, and development. Learn Python programming and gain insights into data analysis.

ml.title: Machine Learning by DeepLearning.AI on Coursera
ml.description: Dive into machine learning with a focus on deep learning. Explore neural networks, TensorFlow, and Keras to build powerful ML models.

ml.title: Applied Machine Learning in Python by University of Michigan on Coursera
ml.description: This course emphasizes practical application of machine learning concepts using Python. Work with Scikit-learn and Pandas to solve real-world problems.

dl.title: Deep Learning Specialization by DeepLearning.AI on Coursera
dl.description: This foundational program helps you understand deep learning capabilities, challenges, and consequences. Learn to build and train neural network architectures, apply strategies like Dropout and BatchNorm, and tackle real-world cases such as speech recognition, music synthesis, and natural language processing.

dl.title: Neural Networks and Deep Learning by DeepLearning.AI on Coursera
dl.description: Master the foundations of deep learning with this course. Explore computer vision, NLP, and GANs. Gain practical skills to break into cutting-edge AI.

dl.title: Complete Guide to TensorFlow for Deep Learning with Python on Udemy
dl.description: Learn TensorFlow, a popular framework for building deep learning models. This beginner-friendly course covers practical applications and introduces you to TensorFlow.

dl.title: Deep Learning A-Z: Hands-On Artificial Neural Networks on Udemy
dl.description: Build various types of artificial neural networks using Python and Keras. Gain hands-on experience in deep learning with practical examples.

ds-algo.title: Data Structures and Algorithms Specialization by University of California San Diego
ds-algo.description: This specialization equips you with foundational knowledge in data structures and algorithms. Explore topics like graph theory, computational logic, and mathematical analysis. Gain practical skills to efficiently organize, manipulate, and analyze data.

ds-algo.title: Algorithms, Part I by Princeton University
ds-algo.description: Dive deeper into algorithms with this course. Explore Java programming, data structures, and problem-solving techniques.

ds-algo.title: Foundations of Data Structures and Algorithms by University of Colorado Boulder
ds-algo.description: This specialization covers essential data structures and algorithms. Learn about graph theory, computational logic, and Python programming.

ds-algo.title: Python for Data Science, AI & Development by IBM on Coursera
ds-algo.description: This course covers essential Python skills for data science, AI, and development. Learn Python programming and gain insights into data analysis.
